title: Repeated Transactions
description: Schema for defining recurring financial transactions within the application.

payorId.description: Identifier for the payor in the transaction.

payeeId.description: Identifier for the payee in the transaction.

categoryId.description: Category identifier for organizing the transaction.

amount.description: The monetary value of the transaction.

frequency.description: Defines how often the transaction repeats.

interval.description: The interval at which the frequency is applied. For example, every 2 weeks.

description.description: A detailed description of the transaction.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the transaction was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp of the last update to the transaction. Nullable to accommodate transactions that have not been updated.
